version_description:
Bug fixes and performance updates.

Apple Watch Tips:
- Turn Apple Watch notifications on by pairing your devices and visiting the Settings section of your Lookout iPhone app.
- To ensure your Apple Watch and iPhone stay connected, be sure Bluetooth and Wi-Fi are turned on and keep your devices in close range.

Lookout was featured on 60 Minutes! Check out the clip and learn why mobile security matters now more than ever: http://bit.ly/241Xs4C

Bug fixes and performance updates.

Use Lookout to determine if your device is impacted by the Pegasus attack, a critical threat that affects iOS devices. Visit our blog to learn more: blog.lookout.com
Use Lookout to determine if your device is impacted by the Pegasus attack, a critical threat that affects iOS devices. Visit our blog to learn more: blog.lookout.com

Introducing Breach Report and Identity Protection from Lookout! Check out our newest security features to see how Lookout helps protect your personal information and restore your identity if it's ever stolen. Watch the video to learn more: http://bit.ly/3fBgMD9

Breach Report - Premium
- Receive timely alerts whenever a company, app or service you use suffers a data breach that could impact your security, privacy and financial resources.

Identity Theft Protection - Premium Plus
- Lookout monitors your personal and financial information as well as your online reputation to detect and protect against identity theft faster.

Identity Restoration & Insurance - Premium Plus
- Let Lookout help take care of the headache and hassle of restoring your identity if it’s ever stolen with 24/7 access to ID Restoration Experts and $1M Identity Theft Insurance.

Identity Restoration & Insurance - Premium Plus (available in the US only)
- Let Lookout help take care of the headache and hassle of restoring your identity if it’s ever stolen with 24/7 access to ID Restoration Experts and $1M Identity Theft Insurance.

- General app improvements
- Fixed an issue for users that were seeing a red notification badge. If you are still experiencing this bug, please contact our support team at support@lookout.com
Bug Fixes

* Fixed an issue for some customers who were unable to access Premium Plus features
* Bug fixes

Please note that Premium Plus is currently only available in the US.

Overall app improvements + fixed a few bugs

Please note that Premium Plus is currently only available in the US.

- This version of Lookout is compatible with iOS 9 and higher. If your device is running on iOS 8 or below, the Lookout app will continue to function as it does today, but you will no longer receive any updates to the app. To ensure your device has the most up-to-date protection, update your software by visiting the Settings section on your device.

- Please note that Premium Plus is currently only available in the US.

Introducing Safe Wi-Fi, our newest security feature that protects you and your data from dangerous Wi-Fi attacks. Get peace of mind as you connect to Wi-Fi networks on the go, knowing that Lookout is checking to make sure your connection is safe and secure.

We’re are excited to introduce Safe Browsing, a brand new security feature to keep you and your personal data safe and secure while browsing the web. Along with this new Safe Browsing feature, we are introducing a new design for the Lookout Personal app!
- Bug Fixes
Bug fixes + overall app improvements

We’re are excited to introduce Safe Browsing, a brand new security feature to keep you and your personal data safe and secure while browsing the web. Along with this new Safe Browsing feature, we are introducing a new design for the Lookout Personal app!

Introducing ID Scan, our newest feature that allows Basic users to scan the web to determine if their emails have been involved in any known data breaches. If you find out you’re involved in a breach, ID Scan suggests courses of action for you to take to help protect your data.

We also want to introduce a free trial of our highest tier offering, Premium Plus. This month-long free trial gives you access to all the benefits of Premium Plus.
